document_data.name: Putrid Fen
document_data.mainbody: The '''Putrid Fen''' was one of the three swamps that composed the blighted landscape of the [[Feywild]] referred to as the [[dark fey enclave]].
document_data.Geography: The Putrid Fen was located on the western stretch of the dark fey enclave, connected to the upper and lower banks of the once-beautiful river that ran through the region.
document_data.History:
Along with the rest of the dark fey enclave, the landscape of the region was changed when [[Magra Curse-Eye]] took up residence nearby and set her coven of witches to work. The witches' concoctions were distributed to the foul trolls of [[Malabog]]'s army, who used them to foul the standing water that permeated the land.

The fomorian coven also introduced the noxious [[witchcap toadstool]]s to the local ecosystem, further contributing to the wholly-earned "putrid" moniker of the fen.
document_data.Inhabitants: The fen was home to the great number of troll soldiers that served the fomorian king Malabog.
